summary.para: Inserts a pointer to an item identifier list (PIDL) into a results folder.

param.name: pidl
param.para: A pointer to the IDList of the given object relative to the Desktop.

param.name: ppidlAdded
param.para: A PIDL consisting of 0 or 1 structures, relative to a parent folder. This parameter maybe NULL.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: The PIDL received represents the item that was just added and is a unique representation of this item generated by this results folder. It is only valid when used in reference to this results folder and should not be combined with a PIDL to another folder, including the folder this item originally came from.

summary.para: Adds an item to a results folder.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Removes all items from a results folder.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Removes a pointer to an item identifier list (PIDL) from a results folder.

param.name: pidl
param.para: A PIDL relative to the Desktop.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Removes an item from a results folder.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that hold items from a data object.
An IResultsFolder is a folder that can hold items from all over the namespace and represent them to the user in a single folder.
